name: Metal Mayhem
description:
Use your guitar to fight your way through 24 levels of mayhem!

*** Challenging Puzzles! ***

solve the puzzles and save yourself from the depths of hell

*** Rack Up Combo's! ***

combination kill those evil minions to gain higher scores and extra jumps

*** Intense Boss Fights! ***

meet the masters and try to destroy the beast's of darkness in major epic boss fights

*** Full Metal Soundtrack! ***

with unique

never before heard songs by:

https://www.soundcloud.com/wantasticginger

*** Achievement's And Leaderboards! ***

24 leaderboards 10 Achievement's

*** Share Your Scores to Facebook and Twitter ***

Easy one click Facebook sharing and Twitter support

*** Free To Play!!! ***

Play the full game for free!
